downloadTitle: Configuration Manager Sample Power BI Reports
downloadDescription: Sample Power BI reports for download and use with Configuration Manager current branch.
detailsSection:
Starting in version 2002, you can integrate Power BI Report Server with Configuration Manager reporting. These are sample reports that you can install in Configuration Manager. Reports included are:
  • Software Update Compliance Status.
  • Software Update Deployment Status
  • Client Status
  • Content Status
  • Microsoft Edge management

Release History
  • 10/7/2021 - Update Release. Added new reports for client status, content status and Microsoft Edge management)
  • 8/11/2020 - Update Release (bug fixes)
  • 6/23/2020 - Initial Release version
systemRequirementsSection:
• Configuration Manager current branch (version 2002 or above) reporting services point with Power BI Report Server integrated.
  • A version of Microsoft Power BI Desktop (Optimized for Power BI Report Server) released between September 2019 and January 2021.
installInstructionSection: For installation instructions see Install Power BI sample reports.

relatedResourcesSection.title: • Microsoft Power BI Desktop (Optimized for Power BI Report Server - September 2019)
